titles.title: Bless The Lord O My Soul

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
Bless the Lord O my soul
And all that is within me
Bless His holy name x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He has done great things
(sisters "Hallelujah")
He has done great things
(sisters "Hallelujah")
He has done great things
Bless His holy name

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Bless the Lord O my soul
And all that is within me
Bless His holy name
